title: Mood-Based Music Recommendation System
description: Won 1st place at DS3 Showcase. Built emotion-aware recommendation system processing 2,000 songs using RoBERTa transformer for YouTube comment analysis, achieving 10x performance improvement through optimized K-means clustering.

title: The Seismic Lottery: Earthquake Impact Visualization
description: Won Best Project & People's Choice Awards (top 8% of 182 students) in DSC 106. Interactive 3D visualization using D3.js v7 demonstrating infrastructure's role in disaster impact with 60fps performance.

title: Stock Price Prediction with Deep Learning
description: Collaborated with Triton Quantitative Trading club to build ensemble system combining LSTM, GRU, and hybrid architectures achieving 82.4% RÂ² score. Integrated VADER sentiment analysis and Monte Carlo simulations.

title: RideRipple: Tracing Boston's Bike Currents
description: Data visualization project analyzing Boston's bike-sharing patterns and traffic flow using Hubway data. Created interactive visualizations to trace cycling patterns across the city.

title: Apple Financial Chatbot using LangChain
description: Developed RAG-powered chatbot to analyze Apple's 10-K filings using LangChain and Hugging Face, achieving 85% response accuracy with context-aware NLP and vector embeddings.

title: Power Outage Prediction: Climate Analysis
description: Built ML pipeline processing 1,540 outage records with Random Forest classifier achieving 75.41% accuracy. Implemented NMAR missingness analysis and validated model fairness across demographic groups.

title: Family Feud Game
description: Python-based implementation of the popular Family Feud game show with interactive gameplay features and scoring system.

title: Image Processing Application
description: Python application for image manipulation and processing with various filters and transformations including edge detection, blur effects, and color adjustments.

title: Mammogram Mass Detection Project
description: Machine learning project for detecting masses in mammogram images using Jupyter Notebook, implementing classification algorithms for medical imaging analysis.

title: Coding Assistant
description: AI-powered coding assistant built with Python to help developers with code suggestions, syntax correction, and debugging assistance.

title: Monte Carlo Stock Simulator
description: Streamlit application for simulating future stock prices using Brownian motion and Monte Carlo methods with adjustable volatility and drift parameters.
